## **Description of Goods and Services**
The Royal Canadian Navy and its respective departments within the Maritime Forces Atlantic (MARLANT) region require access to various standard and emergency hazardous material spill products for application in a marine environment. These products support the RCN’s Safety and Environment mandate to prevent, contain, clean, and respond to hazardous material incidents in MARLANT’s area of operation.
